Program Description \n(guideline): $1,000/ton for Air Source Heat Pumps, capped at 50% of costs. See details for pricing for less than 2 or greater than 5 tons.
Rebate Value*:
<=2 tons: $2,000
3-5 tons: $1000/ton
>5 tons: additional $500/ton
OR
50% of costs, whichever is lower
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: 1 ton or 12,000 BTU/hour rated load capacity minimum
Other Restrictions:
Outdoor Mount â‰¤ 2 tons | $2000
Outdoor Mount 3 -5 tons | $1000/ton
Outdoor Mount over 5 tons | additional $500/ton

Permanent installations only; units do not qualify.

Representative amount based on 3 tons.
Stacking Details: One installation per account per year. $20,000 rebate maximum per project.

Technology*: HVAC - Air to Water Heat Pump
Program Description \n(guideline): $1000/ton rebate for Air to Water Heat Pumps, capped at 50% of costs.
Other Restrictions: Representative amount based on 3 tons.
Stacking Details: One installation per account per year. $20,000 rebate maximum per project.

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description \n(guideline): $1000/ton rebate for new Ground Source Heat Pumps, capped at 50% of costs.
Other Restrictions: Representative amount based on 3 tons.
Stacking Details: One installation per account per year. $20,000 rebate maximum per project.

Program Description \n(guideline): $180 rebate for ENERGY STAR-certified Hybrid Heat Pump Dryer
Other Restrictions:
All appliances MUST be Energy Star Certified.
Rebates DO apply to new construction/purchases.
Stacking Details: One of each appliance per account per year.

Program Description \n(guideline): $200 rebate for Whole House Fan. Replacement or new construction. Attic ventilation not eligible.
Other Restrictions: Replacement or new construction.

Program Description \n(guideline): $25 rebate per unit for electric Smart Thermostats
Other Restrictions: Limits two thermostats per member account; limit of 5 line voltage Smart thermostats per member account

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $450 rebate for induction cooktop/range.
Rebate Value*:
Transition from electric to induction | $150
Transition from natural gas or propane to induction; or new construction | $450
Other Restrictions:
Transition from natural gas or propane to induction cooktop; or new construction: $450
Transition from electric to induction: $150
Replacement of old gas cooktop/range requires proof of old unit. Photograph is sufficient.

Program Description \n(guideline): $700 rebate for ENERGY STAR-certified Air Source Heat Pump Water Heater. Minimum 30 gallons.
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Must be Energy Star Certified, May have a backup resistance element

Program Description \n(guideline): $100 rebate for Residential Energy Audit
Contractor Restrictions: A minimum of a walkthrough energy audit must be performed by a RESNET or BPI certified auditor.
Other Restrictions: Only available to member accounts with a residential electric rate

Program Description \n(guideline): $30/kW rebate for Controlled Off-Peak Electric Thermal Storage (Minimum 1 kW)
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Units must be controlled by a timer or a master control system
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: Minimum qualifying load for ETS is 1 kW

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of cost up to $500 rebate for non-riding Lawn Mower (36 Volt minimum or corded)
Other Restrictions: New battery or corded equipment only. Minimum purchase price of $50. Multi-piece equipment combinations are eligible for individual rebate amounts provided $50 cost minimum is met
Stacking Details:
Other than electric bikes, members are limited to one rebate per product type per year.

An aggregated maximum rebate of $600 per member account applies to listed equipment except riding lawnmowers.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of costs up to $500 for EV charging equipment, and 50% up to $500 for installation, for Level 2 Residential Charger
Rebate Value*: 50% cost match up to $500 for equipment and $500 for installation
Other Restrictions:
EV charging installations require a dedicated circuit.
Limit one rebate per consumer account per year.
Equipment must be new; used equipment does not qualify.
Data collection capability not required, but encouraged
Stacking Details: Limit two chargers per member account

Program Description \n(guideline): $750 rebate for new All Electric Plug-In Vehicle (EV), capped at 50% of purchase price
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Has a maximum speed of at least 65 mph
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: Has a gross vehicle weight rating of 8,500 pounds or less
Other Restrictions: Proof of registration in the same county as the SMPA account required

Program Description \n(guideline): $750 rebate for used All Electric Plug-In Vehicle (EV), capped at 50% of purchase price
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Has a maximum speed of at least 65 mph
Equipment Capacity Restrictions: Has a gross vehicle weight rating of 8,500 pounds or less
Other Restrictions: Proof of registration in the same county as the SMPA account required
